installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# CoD 4X Installation script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt-get update -y
apt install unzip curl wget -y

DOWNLOAD_LINK=https://cod4x.ovh/uploads/short-url/59kvOM9hBabZjPJRlLX029BcskI.zip

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server/

## this is a simple script to validate a download url actually exists and is reachable
if [ ! -z "${DOWNLOAD_LINK}" ]; then 
    if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}; then
        echo -e "Download-URL is reachable."
    else        
        echo -e "Could not reach ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}."
        echo -e "Aborting installation..."
        exit 1
    fi
fi

# Download the server binaries
echo -e "running 'curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}'" 
curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}

echo -e "Unpacking server files"
unzip -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}

echo -e "Moving server files to /mnt/server"
mv ./cod4x_server-linux_21.2/cod4x-linux-server/* .

echo -e "Cleaning up downloaded files."
rm ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
rm -rf ./cod4x_server-linux_21.2/cod4x-linux-server

echo -e "Installing required runtime libs."
mv ./runtime/libstdc++.so.6 .

echo -e "Generating config file"
cat <<EOF > ./main/server.cfg
sv_hostname "${SERVER_NAME}"
g_password "${SERVER_PASSWORD}"
rcon_password "${ADMIN_PASSWORD}"

sv_punkbuster "0"
sv_cheats "0"
sv_voice "0"
scr_teambalance "1"
g_allowvote "1"

sv_authorizemode "0"
sv_authtoken "${SERVER_AUTH_TOKEN}"

sv_floodProtect "1"

sv_mapRotation "${MAP_ROTATION}"
EOF

echo -e "running 'chmod +x ./cod4x18_dedrun'"
chmod +x ./cod4x18_dedrun

echo -e "Installation complete"
